Text:
This has only one audio, hence the not so big size difference with the Russian 720p.

The Russian version also has a high bitrate for a 720p.
Can you upload the theatrical version of this also? I like this movie much better with the Tangerine Dream soundtrack.

The theatrical version sucks.  The studio suits chopped and slashed Ridley Scott's movie into a mess.  You are the only person I've ever heard that prefers it.  My suggestion is buy the soundtrack to the theatrical version and enjoy Tangerine Dream by themselves.
